my #rstats workflow victory of the day was discovering that I could trim off whitespace around an image with this:

library(magick)
image_path <- "~/myimage.png"
image_read(image_path) %>%
  image_trim() %>%
  image_write(image_path)

that `image_trim` magick is pretty sparkly
